text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
— Daily minimum air temperature average; -2°C. 
― Monthly hours of sunshine average; 40.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
As the numbers suggest, December in Germany 
is dark and cold. But, it is also a time of bright nights, 
lit by a gentle 2700K light.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
— Christmas. 
An important time of the year for Germans, and one where 
my parents are exceedingly busy running their cake shop.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I remember watching my father work long into the night, 
visibly exhausted, pouring his heart and soul into 
measuring sugar down to the gram—

text_block_list.name: Flash' Father
text_block_list.text: …I need to reduce it a gram…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
As a child, perhaps his overly serious attitude unsettled me. 
But, knowing it to be off the mark now, I posed him a question.

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: Papa, why are you so fussy about that? A small difference won't make your cakes less delicious!

text_block_list.name: Flash' Father
text_block_list.text:
<i>... Flash. Remember well. 
A single gram can—<i/>

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: — throw everything off, he said.

One day at the track. A black-haired horsegirl stood out 
from the students training.
― 1 minute, 58.1 seconds; task completed.

Five minute break at 11:45, right on schedule. 
And after that—

She'd been running quitely for a while now, checking her times, 
taking breaks... It looked like she was smoothly completing 
a schedule she had made.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, hey... the girl over there, is that Eishin Flash? 
The exchange student from Germany, was she?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's her. She's been here for like a year now, I think? 
I've never talked to her though...

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Ehh crap… did she hear us? 
L-let's move, c'mon…

It's rare to see anybody from Germany even at this academy 
with its many exchange students. Add in her clinical demeanor 
and it's no surprise she'd pique the interests of other students.

But she didn't seem to pay any attention 
to the noise around her…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … Let's start.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Phew…!

Her neatly coiffed black hair and tail glistened in the sun. 
I found myself attracted to the beautiful way they 
floated through the wind as she ran.

Some time later, I noticed Eishin Flash somewhere else. 
She seemed to have gotten involved with a cheerful horsegirl...

Comee oon, Flaaashhh. Just for a little bit. Please? 
Just come look at Falco's live for a moment～♪

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ... How many minutes are in a "moment"?
Huh?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon, please speak in precise terms. 
Please tell me how many minutes and seconds your 
live event is scheduled for.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Wehh!? 
Don't tease me like we're in grade school~!?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
… No, I'm not teasing you? But I wrote my schedule down to 
the second so I don't have a lot of time to spare.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
There it is again! Flash's schedule! 
It's okay to shuffle it around a little~!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, I can't tolerate even a second of deviation. 
That is now how things should be done.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
This time I have defined a schedule in seconds and accounted 
for travel time. A flawless schedule for self-development...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
As long as I stick to it, I will see the right result 
in the Selection Race this time.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I mean, sure the upcoming race is really impotant to you, but...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: It's not important so much as it is the only correct result.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: O-ooh… You're not pushing yourself too hard, are you?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
There is not a single issue. 
Everything is proceding, properly and without a hitch.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ... Excuse me, I have already lost 5m 55s of travel time.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Please inform me about your next live ahead of time. 
I will include it in my plans after the Selection Race. Until then.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ahh, hey!?

Eishin Flash ran off with a neutral expression. 
Apparently she is a very punctual girl.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Aah~, she's gone. Well then~ There's someone here who surely wants to watch my live☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Falko knew right away you were full of passion♪ 
Let me show you to☆ your☆ seat☆

As this pushy horsegirl dragged me with her, my mind was still 
on Eishin Flash… I decided to go watch her Selection Race.
However, on the day of the Selection Race. Eishin Flash—
